title: bots
body:
this ocean week seems to have brought them out in force. 
of my 6 games, 2 have had people either botting, or so bad they would lose againt riots easy bots.
Is there anything more we can do other than report for third party programs/intentional feeding?

replies.body: Make sure you include the word 'bot' in the description of your report.

> Is there anything more we can do other than report for third party programs/intentional feeding?
 
not really, buts its pointless anyway when they can just make a new account/s and just start the cycle all over again.
